nodes.text: The heavy dwarf spider droid was the successor of the original dwarf spider droid, not to be confused with the advanced dwarf spider droid, another improved version.

Heavy dwarf spider droids were donated by the Commerce Guild to the Confederacy of Independent Systems military during the Clone Wars and were deployed at the First Battle of Geonosis. Heavy dwarf spider droids were usually deployed in units of four, or in forces consisting of 2-5 units.
